newsitem.title: USA: Dow Jones average gains more than 50 points.
newsitem.headline: Dow Jones average gains more than 50 points.

text.p: The Dow Jones industrial average gained more than 50 points on Thursday following a rebound in bonds. Wall Street was also encouraged that an expected flurry of selling on a proposed capital gains tax cut did not materialize.
At 1459 GMT, the Dow was up 52.98 points at 7,138.63, which activated the New York Stock Exchange's limit on program trading.
